name: Foot Fetish Fortress VolTitan Vs. The Jundoh Empire Vol.2
name_original: Foot Fetish Fortress VolTitan Vs. The Jundoh Empire Vol.2
description:
Follow Marvin's journey in this super robot action-comedy where he's been recruited to wield VolTitan! A giant, bionic foot fetish powered War-God, and defend the planet Feeternia against the Jundoh Empire a puritanical galactic empire bent on making humanity their bitches with their army of giant monsters. After a humiliating defeat, the relentless Jundoh Empire Strikes back with Doctor J's new weapon. Will VolTitan's power be enough to handle the threat?

Features:
  • Nine action-packed episodes(In more ways than one)
  • A colorful cast of characters.
  • Super robot on giant monster action.
  • Foot fetish, and f/m tickling scenario choices that can affect VolTitan's finishing moves.
  • Retro anime aesthetic.
  • 92+ CGs to collect in the gallery menu.
  • 33 different foot and tickling fetish scenarios.
  • Comedy(Crude Humor/Sex humor/Black comedy.)
